songs.post_title: happy/motivational songs
songs.comment_text:
About ten years ago, I was living in Dublin. One particularly rainy day, I picked up some meds for a sick friend and headed to their place in a taxi. The driver, a black fellow with a thick African accent, greeted me with a massive smile, asked me how I was, and when I asked him back he replied with "I'm doing great mate, it's a beautiful day". At that point, some random song was playing on the radio, but when it switched to Beautiful Day, that guy's smile got even wider and he looked at me, saying "See mate? I told you, it's a beautiful day", drumming on his steering wheel to the rhythm all the way.

It's one of those moments I go back to when I feel really down and need a pick me up.

songs.song: I Won't Give Up (Instrumental Version) [Originally performed by Jason Mraz]
songs.post_title: happy/motivational songs
songs.comment_text:
My boyfriend and I had lots of ups and downs since we were 15 years old. Everybody was telling us we were too young to recognize love. Both of our parents think that-- mostly my parents. They were worried it would affect my studies and not finish college. So when this came out we related to this song and this has been our song ever since. Last year was the hardest year in our relationship. We couldn't get past a week without arguing. We were both tired of just about everything that's happening. We both forgot how to communicate. We couldn't understamd what each other was saying. He was about to go to another country for work and I believed at that time we couldn't survive the distance. We were constantly arguing when we were together, so I thought what more when we're far away from each other. We talked a few days before his flight. We gave up trying to understand the other. We were just finishing what we ordered in the cafe and I was planning to go home. I nearly finished my order when suddenly he said something under his breath "out of all the days..." I asked him "What?" And he just looked at me smiling with soft eyes saying "Nothing." After a few seconds I knew what he was talking about. On the speakers of the cafe was this song playing. And I just broke down and he started crying. We didn't care if people were staring at us. Listening to this song in that cafe at that exact moment brought up all that we've been through and how we got past all of it. After the song, we just looked at each other and decided to talk more about our problems. We talked for hours until our tears dried out. At the end of the night we decided to work things out. I believe God sent this song at that moment to give us a sign and remind us of our promise to not give up even if the skies get rough. It's our 10th anniversary today. ‚ù§Ô∏è Years ago we planned to have our wedding today. but we couldn't due to financial reasons and also him being in another country for work.

UPDATE: We now have a kid ‚ù§Ô∏è

songs.post_title: Happy Uplifting Rock Songs - Feel-Good Rock Music Playlist (Updated 2025)
songs.comment_text: Back in 1988 My daughter was burned in a house fire. She was flown to Shriners hospital in Boston for treatment. While driving to the Hospital, I played this song over and over again while fighting back tears. To this day I can't listen to this song without tearing up. My daughter now has a Doctorate in Physical therapy and just received her Masters in Hospital Management !

Thank you Chris, Johnny, Will and Guy for not only being the best band ever with the most beautiful music, but for also genuinely caring and loving people. I know you guys probably won‚Äôt see this but I need you to know how much you‚Äôve impacted my life and supported me through some dark times. You‚Äôre not appreciated enough for your talents and big hearts. Love you loads üß°

songs.post_title: Happy Love songs
songs.comment_text: This is story which most of us will relate to. Love is not always meant to have a happy ending, there are just moments of joy interspersed with pain, separation and agony. One of the most realistic love stories i have ever seen. Gives a lump in the throat at the end. But it also gives us a very big lesson. When you know she is the one that makes you happy just be with her. Money, fame, lust and everything else is so small infront of happiness and love.

songs.song: Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go
songs.post_title: Songs That Will INSTANTLY Put You In A Good Mood
songs.comment_text:
I'm in my late 70's. I remember when this song was released. My girlfriend and I danced and danced to this song. We loved it. I am still dancing, only alone now. My dog thinks the old man has lost it because I dance around the house when I listen to this song. ...I turn the volume up and I know the neighbors say, "he is partying again"..LOL---- UPDATE: Sept. 12, 2022: Just wanted you my friends, to know I celebrated my 80th birthday and danced to "Wake Me Up Before You Go GO". I lost my dog a few months ago due to cancer. He was with me nearly 18 years. I sure miss the little guy. The kind comments you left below and emails, have made this old man smile and laugh. I wish you all the best. Please stay well and keep in touch.
Dec. 25, 2022: Just want to wish all of you nice people Happy Holidays and to thank you for the nice notes you send me. You are the best. Stay well and let us keep on dancing. I plan to give all of you a New Year's eve toast while I am dancing to "Wake Me Up Before You Go".
Hugs to all of you.
June 8, 2024: Last night they had a dance at the club house and played music from the 60's and 70's and they played "Wake me Up Before you Go Go"... I thought I have to let my friends on YouTube know about this.... Of course I danced with a nice young lady who made my evening even greater. üòâ Hope all is well with all of you. XX

songs.song: Everybody's Got Somebody But Me (made popular by Hunter Hayes ft. Jason Mraz) [vocal version]
songs.post_title: Happy songs to make you smile!
songs.comment_text: Cheers to all the single people out there! This is our song!

songs.post_title: Happy songs to make you smile!
songs.comment_text:
As I've really been struggling with self esteem, self worth, depression, anxiety and have been feeling super low lately, finding this song on my morning commute on the train - it means so much to me! I'm trying as hard as I can to not cry on the train as all of these feelings are suddenly welling up unexpectedly! 

I've always been a Mraz fan, but in this long term rut of depression I've forgotten a lot of what makes me happy. I'm setting this as my morning alarm song to remind me that I can and deserve to be happy. <3 

I really doubt you'll ever see this, Jason, but in the very slim chance you do: thank you! You'll probably never know how much of a difference you've made for me. <3 

As I'm writing this, I've suddenly realized that, in this long term depression, I'd forgotten about "The Remedy" and that means way more to me now than it ever did in the past

songs.song: Don't Look Back in Anger - Remastered
songs.post_title: Top 40 Feel Good Songs of the 90s
songs.comment_text: I was 14 when this song came out, we had to wait hours just to see this vid on MTV, we had no internet. I found the lyrics on a magazine, I ripped the page and put it on the wall, it was golden to me. We used to sing their songs while coming home from school. We didn't know but it was the best fckin time of our lives, thank you Oasis for growing up with us.

songs.comment_text: He's telling such a sad story. In Afterhours he had his face demolished. He comes back like, look at me girl, I fixed myself up, take me back. But its a tragedy, cause no matter how much he fixes his face, his image, he'll still be the same villain he's always been, still causing trouble. The same villain who broke her heart.

songs.post_title: Happy songs / Upbeat songs / Feel-good songs / Songs that make you smile, dance : music from 50s 60s 70s 80s 90s 2000s 2010s 2020s
songs.comment_text: *When only after 10 years we realise how ICONIC our childhood actually was*

songs.song: Just Give Me A Reason (made popular by P!nk ft. Nate Ruess) [vocal version]
songs.post_title: Happy songs / Upbeat songs / Feel-good songs / Songs that make you smile, dance : music from 50s 60s 70s 80s 90s 2000s 2010s 2020s
songs.comment_text: "We're not broken, just bent..."    This particular line really sticks out to me now.   P!NK's concert was the last one that me and my ex wife seen before we were divorced.  We were already separated at the time.  When we were exchanging time with our son the feeling was always there.    A few years later, 2016, she was diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer.  She had  passed away 8 months later in 2017 1 week before her birthday after our son wanted me to ask her if she wanted to go to the aquarium with us during my vacation time with him.   I thank God that she accepted. It felt like nothing even happened the whole day, we were a family unit again... "not broken, just bent"
